note.p: Text of the Mishnah from the Bibliothèque nationale de France. MS Hébreu 328-329 Transcribed from: .
This document replaces the sample version prepared by Daniel Goldberg, Paris.xml

handNote.note: Bar Asher describes the pointing as reflecting a unique tradition

revisionDesc.change: Transcription of Bavot by Nurit Ezer

ab.label: ב׳
ab.note: Scribe (second hand?) has added small mark to note missing א. Perhaps creating אל ligature.

ab.label: י׳
ab.w: לחבPointing with hiriq under מ; transcriber proposed that a second scribe corrected to עמי,ירו
ab.label: י״א
ו׳
ab.w: ול Perhaps a correction, rather than a ligature.א
